"Yaaay!" Ashley is ecstatic, and you feel your body start to be pushed back. With a forceful gulp, Ashley sends your little body down her throat. The rhythmic pulsations drive you past her the deep beating of her heart, and into her groaning stomach. When you land with a plop, you notice that this cavern, too, has a faint glow in it. This helps you pick out a spot that isn't as...wet and slimy. You notice bits of mush and food that apparently wasn't cleared out or digested well enough. Ashley did always enjoy swallowing her tiny snacks whole. In fact, on several occassions you've heard her stomach loudly rip apart those treats. It seems that it's kind of a messy process.

Ashley pats her quieting tummy. "Woohoo! How do you like my stomach, bro? Nice and warm and cozy, huh?" The young girl giggles. She doesn't know every detail about what happens to food when she eats, but she has a good idea that her stomach probably isn't a paradise.

You pound once on the wall of her stomach in response. "Ow, bro, I felt that!" Ashley says, giggling once more. "I'm gonna drink some soda now. Kinda thirsty." She announces. You figure that you're in no place to object. Just hope that she lets you out...

Ashley goes to the fridge and grabs a bottle of root beer. It opens up to her with a fizz, and then the nozzle goes right in her mouth. Gulp, gulp, gulp. The root beer starts flowing into her tummy like a waterfall producing tidal waves. You, a good swimmer luckily, keep yourself (mostly) afloat during it all.

"Ahh," Ashley stops for a bit. Inside her stomach, you watch as a magical process happens right in front of you. The soda starts fizzing up on the surface, meeting the warm air trapped in her belly. The bubbles gather and get bigger, until they're pulled out of the stomach with Ashley's next breath.

"Ooh, gotta burp." Ashley says to herself, before letting out a huge sweet sugary burp. "Haha, this burp tasted like you, bro." She announces to you.

"Great, thanks, needed to know that." You respond, not sure if she can hear you, but definitely sure that sentence kinda made you sick.
151322111.title: ...Appeals to you?

You found yourself in her stomach, floating in her gastric juices.

153.content:
"...You play with me in your mouth?" You ask. To be honest, you've always found such a scenario like this to be fascinating. She seems to be even more all about it!

"Heehee, okay!" Her giant hand moves over you and she plucks you off her bed, holding you over her mouth. She's so relaxed, laying on her bed with her legs outstretched, toes pointed towards the ceiling. Her shirt, you see, isn't covering her belly, and you can even see her cute belly button. But, back to the relaxed part. Has she thought of this before?

You feel like you are on a roller coaster when she drops you, sending you plummeting onto her tongue. She shifts her position so her head is more upright, otherwise you would slide down her throat! Her tongue, much like the rest of her mouth, is very warm and moist. You clearly see, even in this darkness, her clean white teeth at your sides and above you. Her breath smells sweet; you think you saw her before with some cereal or something. Come to think of it, you can make out a specific sugary, fruity scent.

Ashley tries as best she can to talk to you, "Heyh! Ith it fun?"

You reply with, "Yeah! It's really cool in here!" You see her mouth move into a smile.

"Heehee!" She giggles at your enjoyment, and it shakes you up a little. Your arms fly out and manage to grab hold of her tongue just in time. A second later and you would've been a snack.

You sit down on her tongue and just listen to the sounds around you. Glistening saliva sloshes a little, soft breaths, in and out, from her nose above, and even the groaning of her stomach, digesting the cereal. It is eerily far away, considering you already know how close you are to joining that chewed-up mush.

"Uh oh..." Ashley thinks to herself, not alerting you. She feels a pressure in her belly, slowly but steadily rise up through her throat.

Suddenly, you hear a loud rumbling noise. "What is happenin-"

Ashley puts her hand to her mouth, and burps with her mouth closed. Surprisingly, it shakes you up less than her giggling, but...

"Ahh...sthorry..." Ashley blushes slightly. Even after her sigh, you can still very much smell the fruity cereal and stomach acid.

"No...problem..." You choke out those words, finding it hard not to smile through it all. It was pretty cute, regardless, you think...

Ashley then asks, "You wan thu come outh?"
153.title: You play with me in your mouth

1532.content:
"No, I like it in here." You say. After the initial shock of her burp, you find the scent lingering in her mouth to be quite pleasant.

You stay and admire your little sister's mouth for a long time. The whole experience is wonderful to you. Her gentle breathing, the sounds echoing around; you could stay here forever.

Ashley, however, pushed you to the side of her mouth a while ago, and has forgotten that you are in there. Thirsty, she grabs a soda and chugs it. You are sent down to her stomach before you have enough time to even react.

"Oh my god, oh my god..." You panic as you stand in a pool of stomach acid. It burns you instantly, and you start screaming, "Ashley!! Let me out!! You swallowed me HELP!!!"

Ashley realizes what she did before hearing you, but then, suddenly, she lets out a long, loud, satisfying belch. You realize at that moment that there is no escape.

"Sorry..." Ashley says, rubbing her tummy, "At least you will be a part of me forever!"

You are a digested glop within minutes. Ashley burps and hears her stomach growl, and goes on about her life.
1532.title: Forgot about you

15332.content:
Ashley's stomach rumbles loudly as you wait for an answer. The humid cavern of her stomach is extremely hard to breathe in, and is slowly deteriorating your energy with a thick heat.

"Hmm..." Your little sister hums, putting her hand to her tummy, "Nah, you can stay in there!" Your helpless body is thrown about as she pats her soft flat tummy.

"W-What?!" You say while regaining your footing. Around you, Ashley's stomach has started to become more active, and a pool of stomach acid is forming, "Please, don't leave me in here! I'll be digested! I'll die!"

"Uh, duh," Ashley replies, as if you're the stupid one for pointing out your frightening mortality against the digestive system of a little girl, "That's what always happens to my snacks." A booming gurgle resounds from her belly.

"I am not your snack!!" You pound and kick at her stomach's walls, as they try to fight you into the central acid lake.

Your little sister simply responds with a loud burp. "My tummy and my awesome burps think you are!"

Ashley goes to lay down and giggles over the sounds of her belly. After a few minutes you can't take the conditions anymore, and she has mostly burped out any breathable air. You digest to the sweet sound of your sister's laughter.

1553.content:
"I'd rather eat you." She says rather simply. She lifts you off of her stomach (ironically), and tosses you into her mouth. It's dark, wet, and smells like old sugary cereal. She swishes you around, coating you in saliva. "Mmm...you taste great..." She thinks to herself, smiling. Then, she tilts her head back, and swallows you.

You go down her throat and fall into her stomach. Instantly, you have to wade through a thick glop of digested cereal and milk. Oh no! You've interrupted digestion! That just means...you're going to die even faster!

Panicked, you begin to fight Ashley's stomach, punching and kicking at the walls in a fit of rage. Why would she just eat you anyway?!

Outside, Ashley enjoys your pitiful struggles, and lets out a huge, unladylike burp. "I think that means my stomach likes you...hee hee!" She says.

Your struggle continues to just make her belch. What now?

15532.content:
After a while of struggling, your sister finally says something.
"Just so you know, when you shrunk, it also made it so that you can't die." It took you a minute to realize what she is saying.
"So I'm not going to be digested?" You ask.
"No, but I'm not going to let you out." She said. "Don't worry, I'll eat food and you can take some." You moved around and found a spot to sit. You might as well sit, since you're going to be here for a long time.
"Do you plan to shrink anyone else?" You suddenly ask. Your sister hesitates before answering. Finally she says:
"I was sort of thinking of shrinking mom, or your girlfriend." She said. "Why, are you getting lonely?
"A little" Both you and Ashley didn't say much for about an hour. At one point you fell asleep. When you woke up, you heard some noises and then suddenly, your red-headed girlfriend, Amy, lands in Ashley's stomach. She looked up and saw you. She gave you a hug. "What are you doing here?" You ask.
"Ashley told me you are going to live in her stomach and we're getting lonely, so I decided to join you." After that, Ashley did what she said she would do where she ate food and both of you were able to get enough from it to survive. Ashley told your mother what happened to you, and she didn't mind. However, after a while, Ashley did shrink her and made her mother her pet. She didn't mind though.
15532.title: You and Your Girlfriend Inside Ashley's Stomach

15533.content:
"Ooh, my burps are awesome." Ashley continues to let out her burps, much to your disgust. She loves to tease you with her bad manners.

Ashley belches deeply. "Mm, tastes like cereal." Her stomach is a gurgling cauldron of stomach acid at this point, and you lose hope, beginning to let yourself get dragged into the digestion of your sister's breakfast.

Then, suddenly, you are pushed up by a big gas bubble, and rise up her throat, and out of her mouth, as she burps some more.

"Aw, I burped you out." Ashley sighs, "Now what am I gonna do with you?"
